entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
